code:
export const Products = [{
  id: 1,
  productName: "Long Sleeve Sweatshirt",
  image: "https://image.uniqlo.com/UQ/ST3/WesternCommon/imagesgoods/436028/sub/goods_436028_sub14.jpg?width=1600&impolicy=quality_75",
  hoverImg: "https://image.uniqlo.com/UQ/ST3/WesternCommon/imagesgoods/436028/sub/goods_436028_sub13.jpg?width=1600&impolicy=quality_75",
  price: "$39.90",
  description: "Jason Polan continuously drew cities and people. Many of his love filled works are now available from UT.",
  material: "Body: 100% Cotton/ Rib: 96% Cotton, 4% Spandex/ Exclusive of Decoration",
  care: "Machine wash cold (Watertemp:40deg)"
}, {
  id: 2,
  productName: "Kappa Hoody",
  image: "https://images-dynamic-arcteryx.imgix.net/S21/1350x1710/Kappa-Hoody-Dracaena.jpg?auto=format%2Ccompress&q=75&ixlib=react-9.0.2&w=926",
  hoverImg: "https://images-dynamic-arcteryx.imgix.net/S21/1350x1710/Kappa-Hoody-Black.jpg?auto=format&w=1350",
  price: "$550.00",
  description: `Coreloft™ insulated hoody with windproof, water-resistant GORE THERMIUM™ shell.  Kappa Series: Insulated windproof outerwear.`,
  detail: [{
    size: "S, M, L, XL, XXL",
    weight: "755 g / 1 lb 10.6 oz",
    fit: "Regular Fit, Hip Length, Centre back length: 80 cm / 31.5 in",
    from: "Mensa Industries Company Ltd., Vietnam"
  }],
  material: ["N70p GORE THERMIUM™", "Coreloft™ 140 (140 g/m²) insulation."],
  care: ["Machine wash in warm water (40°C)", "Double rinse", "Do not use fabric softener", "Tumble dry on medium heat", "Do not iron"],
  feature: ["Water resistant", "Windproof", "Breathable"]
}, {
  id: 3,
  productName: "Signature wallet",
  image: "https://www.pyeshirts.com/assets/images/cathay-img-1.jpg",
  price: "$560",
  description: "Signature leather with black leather details. Eight card slots and two bill compartments",
  warning: ["Protect from direct light, heat and rain. Should it become wet, dry it immediately with a soft cloth", "Clean with a soft, dry cloth"],
  from: "Made in Italy"
}, {
  id: 4,
  productName: "Slim Fit Chino Pants",
  image: "https://s7d2.scene7.com/is/image/aeo/0116_5077_851_of?$pdp-m-opt$&fmt=webp",
  hoverImg: "https://s7d2.scene7.com/is/image/aeo/0116_5077_851_f?$pdp-m-opt$&fmt=webp",
  price: "$37.99",
  material: "97% Cotton, 3% Spandex",
  description: "The material texture was improved for a cleaner look. We were passionate about the details."
}, {
  id: 5,
  productName: "Graphic T-shirt",
  image: "https://lp2.hm.com/hmgoepprod?set=quality%5B79%5D%2Csource%5B%2F36%2F44%2F3644b80ede930cf761b0cf47e1b930032d8d3b99.jpg%5D%2Corigin%5Bdam%5D%2Ccategory%5B%5D%2Ctype%5BLOOKBOOK%5D%2Cres%5Bm%5D%2Chmver%5B1%5D&call=url[file:/product/main]",
  hoverImg: "https://lp2.hm.com/hmgoepprod?set=quality%5B79%5D%2Csource%5B%2Fe3%2F25%2Fe325e57b078545c1d0e708756977d752c18b295d.jpg%5D%2Corigin%5Bdam%5D%2Ccategory%5B%5D%2Ctype%5BLOOKBOOK%5D%2Cres%5Bm%5D%2Chmver%5B1%5D&call=url[file:/product/main]",
  price: "$19.99",
  description: "Oversized T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a printed graphic design at front. Ribbed crew neck and dropped shoulders."
}, {
  id: 6,
  productName: "Hoodie",
  image: "https://www.gapcanada.ca/webcontent/0019/356/448/cn19356448.jpg",
  hoverImg: "https://www.gapcanada.ca/webcontent/0019/314/871/cn19314871.jpg",
  price: "$39.90",
  description: "PEANUTS drawn by popular illustrator, Yu Nagaba. Take a look at the wide range of items!",
  material: "Body: 100% Cotton/ Rib: 78% Cotton, 22% Polyester/ Exclusive of Decoration"
}, {
  id: 7,
  productName: "Kids Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt (PEANUTS X YU NAGABA)",
  image: "https://www.pyeshirts.com/assets/images/cathay-img-1.jpg",
  price: "$14.90",
  description: "PEANUTS drawn by popular illustrator, Yu Nagaba. Take a look at the wide range of items!",
  material: "Cotton: 100%"
}, {
  id: 8,
  productName: "Gabine Saddle Bag",
  image: "https://www.charleskeith.com/dw/image/v2/BCWJ_PRD/on/demandware.static/-/Sites-ck-products/default/dwe385807c/images/hi-res/2021-L2-CK2-80781412-01-4.jpg?sw=1152&sh=1536",
  hoverImg: "https://www.charleskeith.com/dw/image/v2/BCWJ_PRD/on/demandware.static/-/Sites-ck-products/default/dw12b41a8a/images/hi-res/2021-L2-CK2-80781412-01-8.jpg?sw=1152&sh=1536",
  price: "$89.00",
  material: "Faux leather",
  detail: ["Magnetic closure", "Comes with one short non-adjustable strap and one long adjustable strap"],
  description: "Offering carrying versatility thanks to the two detachable bag straps that it comes with, you can carry it as a shoulder bag with the short strap or sling it across your body with the long adjustable strap"
}];

sourcesContent:
export const Products = [
    {
        id: 1,
        productName: "Long Sleeve Sweatshirt",
        image: "https://image.uniqlo.com/UQ/ST3/WesternCommon/imagesgoods/436028/sub/goods_436028_sub14.jpg?width=1600&impolicy=quality_75",
        hoverImg: "https://image.uniqlo.com/UQ/ST3/WesternCommon/imagesgoods/436028/sub/goods_436028_sub13.jpg?width=1600&impolicy=quality_75",
        price: "$39.90",
        description: "Jason Polan continuously drew cities and people. Many of his love filled works are now available from UT.",
        material: "Body: 100% Cotton/ Rib: 96% Cotton, 4% Spandex/ Exclusive of Decoration",
        care: "Machine wash cold (Watertemp:40deg)"
    },
    {
        id: 2,
        productName: "Kappa Hoody",
        image: "https://images-dynamic-arcteryx.imgix.net/S21/1350x1710/Kappa-Hoody-Dracaena.jpg?auto=format%2Ccompress&q=75&ixlib=react-9.0.2&w=926",
        hoverImg: "https://images-dynamic-arcteryx.imgix.net/S21/1350x1710/Kappa-Hoody-Black.jpg?auto=format&w=1350",
        price: "$550.00",
        description: `Coreloft™ insulated hoody with windproof, water-resistant GORE THERMIUM™ shell.  Kappa Series: Insulated windproof outerwear.`,
        detail: [{
            size: "S, M, L, XL, XXL",
            weight: "755 g / 1 lb 10.6 oz",
            fit: "Regular Fit, Hip Length, Centre back length: 80 cm / 31.5 in",
            from: "Mensa Industries Company Ltd., Vietnam"
        }],
        material: ["N70p GORE THERMIUM™", "Coreloft™ 140 (140 g/m²) insulation."],
        care: ["Machine wash in warm water (40°C)", "Double rinse",
        "Do not use fabric softener", "Tumble dry on medium heat", "Do not iron"],
        feature: ["Water resistant", "Windproof", "Breathable"]
    },
    {
        id: 3,
        productName: "Signature wallet",
        image: "https://www.pyeshirts.com/assets/images/cathay-img-1.jpg",
        price: "$560",
        description: "Signature leather with black leather details. Eight card slots and two bill compartments",
        warning: ["Protect from direct light, heat and rain. Should it become wet, dry it immediately with a soft cloth", "Clean with a soft, dry cloth"],
        from: "Made in Italy"
    },
    {
        id: 4,
        productName: "Slim Fit Chino Pants",
        image: "https://s7d2.scene7.com/is/image/aeo/0116_5077_851_of?$pdp-m-opt$&fmt=webp",
        hoverImg: "https://s7d2.scene7.com/is/image/aeo/0116_5077_851_f?$pdp-m-opt$&fmt=webp",
        price: "$37.99",
        material: "97% Cotton, 3% Spandex",
        description: "The material texture was improved for a cleaner look. We were passionate about the details.",
    },
    {
        id: 5,
        productName: "Graphic T-shirt",
        image: "https://lp2.hm.com/hmgoepprod?set=quality%5B79%5D%2Csource%5B%2F36%2F44%2F3644b80ede930cf761b0cf47e1b930032d8d3b99.jpg%5D%2Corigin%5Bdam%5D%2Ccategory%5B%5D%2Ctype%5BLOOKBOOK%5D%2Cres%5Bm%5D%2Chmver%5B1%5D&call=url[file:/product/main]",
        hoverImg: "https://lp2.hm.com/hmgoepprod?set=quality%5B79%5D%2Csource%5B%2Fe3%2F25%2Fe325e57b078545c1d0e708756977d752c18b295d.jpg%5D%2Corigin%5Bdam%5D%2Ccategory%5B%5D%2Ctype%5BLOOKBOOK%5D%2Cres%5Bm%5D%2Chmver%5B1%5D&call=url[file:/product/main]",
        price: "$19.99",
        description: "Oversized T-shirt in soft, organic cotton jersey with a printed graphic design at front. Ribbed crew neck and dropped shoulders.",
    },
    {
        id: 6,
        productName: "Hoodie",
        image: "https://www.gapcanada.ca/webcontent/0019/356/448/cn19356448.jpg",
        hoverImg: "https://www.gapcanada.ca/webcontent/0019/314/871/cn19314871.jpg",
        price: "$39.90",
        description: "PEANUTS drawn by popular illustrator, Yu Nagaba. Take a look at the wide range of items!",
        material: "Body: 100% Cotton/ Rib: 78% Cotton, 22% Polyester/ Exclusive of Decoration"
    },
    {
        id: 7,
        productName: "Kids Short Sleeve Graphic T-Shirt (PEANUTS X YU NAGABA)",
        image: "https://www.pyeshirts.com/assets/images/cathay-img-1.jpg",
        price: "$14.90",
        description: "PEANUTS drawn by popular illustrator, Yu Nagaba. Take a look at the wide range of items!",
        material: "Cotton: 100%"
    },
    {
        id: 8,
        productName: "Gabine Saddle Bag",
        image: "https://www.charleskeith.com/dw/image/v2/BCWJ_PRD/on/demandware.static/-/Sites-ck-products/default/dwe385807c/images/hi-res/2021-L2-CK2-80781412-01-4.jpg?sw=1152&sh=1536",
        hoverImg: "https://www.charleskeith.com/dw/image/v2/BCWJ_PRD/on/demandware.static/-/Sites-ck-products/default/dw12b41a8a/images/hi-res/2021-L2-CK2-80781412-01-8.jpg?sw=1152&sh=1536",
        price: "$89.00",
        material: "Faux leather",
        detail: ["Magnetic closure", "Comes with one short non-adjustable strap and one long adjustable strap"],
        description: "Offering carrying versatility thanks to the two detachable bag straps that it comes with, you can carry it as a shoulder bag with the short strap or sling it across your body with the long adjustable strap",
    }
]
